"You're doing great, keep going!" - Hearing this from your past self would boost your confidence and motivate you to continue working on your goals.
"Remember to take breaks and enjoy the journey." - This advice from your future self would remind you to appreciate the process and not just focus on the end result.
"Be true to yourself and your values." - This message from your past self would remind you of the importance of staying authentic and true to your beliefs and principles.
"Don't be afraid to ask for help." - Hearing this from your future self would encourage you to seek support and guidance when needed.
"Be kind to others and yourself." - This advice from your past self would remind you of the importance of treating others and yourself with compassion and understanding.
